dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to your workflow command center
dashboard.myAssignedTasksDescription: Workflow tasks assigned to you and their current status
dashboard.allSavedWorkflowsDescription: Manage all workflow templates in the system and start new workflow instances
dashboard.mySavedWorkflowsDescription: Manage your saved workflow templates and start new workflow instances
dashboard.myReusableWorkflowsDescription: Workflows you can start multiple times for recurring processes
dashboard.pendingTasksInfo: You'll see workflow tasks assigned to you here
dashboard.createFirstWorkflow: Create and save your first workflow in the Workflow Builder
dashboard.reusableWorkflowsInfo: You'll see reusable workflows you can start here
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Workflow functionality is available for admins and managers. Contact your administrator to get workflow creation permissions.
dashboard.workflowsMovedDescription: All workflow management is now handled in the "My Saved Workflows" section.
dashboard.noTasksMessage: You don't have any tasks ready to work on right now. Tasks will appear here when workflows are started and assigned to you.

workflow.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
workflow.launchError: Failed to launch workflow. Please try again.
workflow.myActiveTasksDescription: Tasks ready for you to work on in active workflows
workflow.noActiveTasksMessage: You don't have any tasks ready to work on right now. Tasks will appear here when workflows are started and assigned to you.

tasks.completionNotesPlaceholder: Add notes about completing this task...
tasks.taskCompletionError: Failed to complete task. Please try again.
